name: Rubix Cube Clicker | The Rubix Idle Game
name_original: Rubix Cube Clicker | The Rubix Idle Game
description:
Rubix Cube Clicker | The Rubix Idle Game is a game developed by Frisco-sqeak. It came out on 01-01-2023.
You can play Rubix Cube Clicker | The Rubix Idle Game on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
